name: Instant Pot® Green Chili Chicken and Rice
author: Huserdaddy
summary: This is a great one-pot dish of green chili chicken and rice with 3 different types of chile peppers - Anaheim, jalapenos and fire roasted green chile peppers, for those of you who like it spicy!
ingredients: 2  boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 (7 ounce) can fire-roasted diced green chile peppers
½ cup diced Anaheim chile peppers
2 teaspoons salt, or more to taste
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or more to taste
directions: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function
Sprinkle with flour and cook until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes
Add green chile peppers, jalapenos, rice, tomato, onion, Anaheim chile, Cheddar cheese, salt, seasoned salt, and pepper; pour in chicken stock and mix to combine
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 18 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper
